name.baseName: Lithium Concentrate Production ; Lithium Spodumene Concentrate (6% Li2O) ; Crushing ; Central Ostrobothnia, Finland (0.6% Li2O)
锂精矿生产 ; 锂辉石精矿（氧化锂含量2.4%） ; 粉碎 ; 芬兰锂辉石矿（氧化锂含量0.6%）

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The future supply routes reviewed in this study are based on data gathered from technical reports and environmental impact assessment reports of several lithium mining and processing companies (Lithium Americas Corp., Minera Salar Blanco, Nemaska Lithium Inc., and Keliber Oy) that are at various stages of developing their lithium assets. These are considered future supply routes as they are not yet active but areexpected to be operational in 5–10 years. The lower lithium concentrations at these brine-based sources also reflect the possible future lithium grades of current supply routes from brines, whose lithium concentrations will likely decrease over the years due to extraction

本研究审查的未来供应路线是基于从几家锂矿开采和加工公司（Lithium Americas Corp.、Minera Salar Blanco、Nemaska Lithium Inc.和Keliber Oy）的技术报告和环境影响评估报告中收集的数据，这些公司的锂资产正处于不同的开发阶段。这些锂资产正处于不同的开发阶段。预计在 5-10 年内投入运营。这些以卤水为基础的来源的锂浓度较低，也反映了当前供应路线中卤水的未来锂品位。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The future supply routes for spodumene are described in technical reports of operations at the Whabouchi site, Canada and the Central Ostrobothnia region, Finland. While neither Canada nor Finland are among the countries with the largest lithium reserves (USGS, 2021), they represent examples of new lithium supplies that might become exploited in response to increased lithium demand. The average lithium concentration in spodumene at the Whabouchi site is about 0.7% and in Central Ostrobothnia region it is 0.6%. In these future supply routes, concentrated spodumene is directly converted to LiOH⋅H2O without producing Li2CO3 as an intermediate. The datasets representing mining operations in Canada and Finland are based on the technical reports prepared for Nemaska Lithium Inc. (Golder Associates, 2013; Laferri´ere et al., 2012; Nemaska Lithium Inc., 2013; SENES Consultants Ltd., 2013) and Keliber Oy (Keliber Oy, 2020a, b; Sweco, 2016), respectively. Specific data for chemical inputs was not available for the LiOH⋅H2O production unit process (from concentrated spodumene) in the Nemaska Lithium reports. Therefore, the chemical usage in the Keliber Oy reports were used as proxy data when comparing the different lithium supplies.

加拿大 Whabouchi 矿区和芬兰中部 Ostrobothnia 地区的运营技术报告中描述了未来的闪锌矿供应路线。虽然加拿大和芬兰都不是锂储量最大的国家（美国地质调查局，2021 年），但它们代表了新锂供应的范例，可能会随着锂需求的增加而被开采。Whabouchi矿区的钠长石中平均锂浓度约为0.7%，而在中奥斯特罗布特尼亚地区则为0.6%。在这些未来的供应路线中，浓缩的磷灰石会直接转化为 LiOH⋅H2O，而不会产生 Li2CO3 作为中间产物。代表加拿大和芬兰采矿作业的数据集分别基于为内玛斯卡锂业公司（Golder Associates，2013 年；Laferri´ere 等人，2012 年；内玛斯卡锂业公司，2013 年；SENES 咨询有限公司，2013 年）和 Keliber Oy（Keliber Oy，2020a，b；Sweco，2016 年）编写的技术报告。在内玛斯卡锂业公司的报告中，没有关于锂OH⋅H2O 生产单元工艺（来自浓缩锂辉石）的化学品投入的具体数据。因此，在比较不同的锂供应时，Keliber Oy 报告中的化学品用量被用作替代数据。
technology.technologicalApplicability: This dataset represents the production process for lithium spodumene concentrate with a lithium oxide (Li2O) content of 6%, derived from Central Ostrobothnia, Finland with an initial Li2O content of 0.6%. Lithium concentrate produced from this process is typically used in the manufacturing of lithium-ion batteries, which are commonly used in portable electronics, electric vehicles, and for grid storage solutions. Additionally, it may be utilized for the production of high purity lithium compounds in pharmaceuticals and other specialized industrial applications.
此数据集代表了始于芬兰中区奥斯特罗博尼亚含氧化锂（Li2O）0.6%的锂辉石矿的锂辉石精矿生产过程，其产物氧化锂含量为6%。从该工艺得到的锂精矿通常用于制造锂离子电池，这类电池广泛应用于便携式电子产品、电动车辆以及电网储能解决方案。此外，它还可用于生产高纯度的锂化合物，用于制药及其他特殊的工业应用中。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Chordia, M., Wickerts, S., Nordelöf, A. & Arvidsson, R. Life cycle environmental impacts of current and future battery-grade lithium supply from brine and spodumene. Resources, Conservation and Recycling 187, 106634 (2022).

Chordia, M., Wickerts, S., Nordelöf, A. & Arvidsson, R. Life cycle environmental impacts of current and future battery-grade lithium supply from brine and spodumene. Resources, Conservation and Recycling 187, 106634 (2022).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users should note that this dataset does not include the production processes for raw materials and energy flows which constitute very small amounts (less than 1%). For accurate Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) modeling, it is crucial to account for these exclusions, especially if this process is a significant part of the LCA model. This dataset is best applied in LCAs calculating the environmental impact of products that include lithium-based components. It may require the combination with other datasets to ensure a comprehensive LCA, including those for transport, further processing, and end-of-life stages.
用户需注意，此数据集未包括原材料的生产过程以及占非常小部分（小于 1%）的能源流。为了精确的生命周期评价（LCA）建模，对这些排除内容必须加以注意，尤其是当这一过程在LCA模型中占有重要部分时。此数据集最适用于计算包含锂基成分产品的环境影响的LCA中。在进行全面的生命周期评价时，可能需要与其他数据集合并使用，这些数据集包括运输、进一步加工以及产品的生命周期终点阶段。

completeness.common:other: The production processes for raw materials and energy flows with very small amounts (less than 1%) are not included.
原材料的生产流程和极少量（小于 1%）的能源流未包括在内。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
